name: Wreckout
description:
Contenders start your engines and prepare to enter the Wreckout arena, as you slingshot your way to brick-busting glory in epic local and online multiplayer encounters. Featuring awesome power-ups and devastating ultimate abilities, Wreckout is the perfect fusion of physics-based, future sports combat with spectacular arcade action.


Take on the world or battle your friends in epic PvP encounters for up to 4 players.

  • Local or online multiplayer for 2-4 players
  • 5 teams and 15 characters to choose from
  • Multiple arenas, each with custom hazards and features


Top the global leaderboards playing solo or with a friend in the ultimate arcade encounter.

  • Brick-busting arcade action against the clock
  • Play solo or with a friend
  • Chain skills to boost your high score


Devastate the competition with awe-inspiring power-ups and ultimate abilities.

  • Boost your skill meter to overcharge power-ups and ultimates
  • Collect power-ups like Brick Armour and Brick Building to stage an epic come back
  • Unleash incredible team-based ultimate abilities like Inferno, Quake and Magno


Multiple arena, teams, characters and rulesets to unlock.

  • Customise your play session with multiple rulesets
  • Download new arenas, team and play modes
  • Switch it up by enabling or disabling power-ups and ultimates
